main event: A round, glowing white object resembling a disk was observed hovering and climbing at a 45-degree angle before disappearing to the southeast.
interesting points: The object was reported to have been seen in the same location 13 days earlier, The observation lasted for about 2 minutes, Witnesses described a bright light that diminished in size before disappearing, This sighting involved a ground-visual observation method, Weather conditions were clear with no clouds and darkness during the sighting.
sighted object: round object glowing white resembling a disk
witness description: crew chief on F86 and an electrician
